name: SOUPER (drizo72)
description:
This game is a simple shoot 'em up game, but with graphical elements based on Paintjam 2021 theme: Campbell's Soup.

You are driving a Campbell's soup can. When you press space, tomato soup is thrown to evil "USPs" Unidentified Spaghettis Plates" which try to catch you. If your tomato soup reaches them, it turns them into a delicious meal and they disappear.

 As you shoot down USPs or time passes, the level of difficulty increases while your can takes different styles of the can inspired by the work of Andy Warhol.

Written in 2021 by Nikolaos and Dimitrios Rizopoulos

All art produced by Nikolaos and Dimitrios Rizopoulos using exclusively Microsoft Paint and  Paint3D, as part of the rules of PaintJam 2021 competition in itch.io.

Music samples based on royalty free music by Dar Golan
